summary: This document is a summary of a call with Larry Fallek on December 12, 2021, discussing an ongoing case involving an individual referred to as GM. It mentions pending litigation, signed affidavits by GM, and Fallek's recollection of deposing GM. Fallek is also seeking a potential witness for information about GM's activities and is available to testify.

persons.name: Larry Fallek
persons.role: Legal professional involved in a case
persons.context: Participated in a call discussing an ongoing case involving GM; previously deposed GM and is available to testify.

connections.description: Larry Fallek deposed GM as part of an ongoing legal case.

events.title: Call with Larry Fallek
events.description: A call was held with Larry Fallek to discuss an ongoing case involving GM, including details about depositions, affidavits, and potential witnesses.

keyFacts: GM owns the defendant corporation in an ongoing case and has signed affidavits on the docket.
Larry Fallek previously deposed GM and recalls GM being charming, but wishes he had asked more questions.
Larry Fallek is seeking an unnamed individual who may have information about GM's activities and is available to testify.
